About Me

Seth Greco.

Full-Stack Engineer.

Web Designer

&

Part-time Outdoorsman

  I am a recent graduate from the University of Texas at San Antonio, having obtained a degree in Computer Science with a concentration in software engineering. Through my studies I found web-development to be the most compelling & fun the tech field has to offer.

  I am a full stack developer using my experince with languages Python & Java, frameworks such as Django & Express, & Libraries like React. & HTML, CSS, Javascript, Mysql, MongoDB & other web related technologies to make a robust skillset.

This Website was built using MERN stack.
